<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Saved Resource Hierarchy (GCP)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/cloud/{cloud_type}/accounts/{account_id}/hierarchy"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get the previously saved resource hierarchy for the specified cloud account ID.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Path Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"cloud_type","in":"path","description":"Cloud type","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["gcp"]}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"account_id","in":"path","description":"GCP account ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

success

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json; charset=UTF-8"} value={"application/json; charset=UTF-8"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"resourceId"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"root","description":"To get the list of resource IDs and its details, Refer List Children of Parent. \n\n **aws**: [List Children of Parent (AWS)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-list-of-children-under-parent-aws/) \n\n **gcp**: [List Children of Parent (GCP)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-list-of-children-under-parent/) \n\n**azure**: [List Children of Parent (Azure)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/list-children-under-parent/)"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"displayName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","example":"Root","description":"To get the display name of resource, Refer List Children of Parent. \n\n **aws**: [List Children of Parent (AWS)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-list-of-children-under-parent-aws/) \n\n **gcp**: [List Children of Parent (GCP)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-list-of-children-under-parent/). Display name is the organization name if `nodeType` is **ORG**\n\n**azure**: [List Children of Parent (Azure)](/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/list-children-under-parent/)"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"nodeType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ORG`, `FOLDER`, `PROJECT`, `SUBSCRIPTION`, `MANAGEMENT_GROUP`, `TENANT`, `ACCOUNT`, `OU`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Member account node type. Supported values based on cloud type: \n\n**aws**:  ORG, OU, or ACCOUNT\n\n **gcp**: ORG, FOLDER, or PROJECT\n\n**azure**: SUBSCRIPTION, MANAGEMENT_GROUP, or TENANT","enum":["ORG","FOLDER","PROJECT","SUBSCRIPTION","MANAGEMENT_GROUP","TENANT","ACCOUNT","OU"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"selectionType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ALL`, `INCLUDE`, `EXCLUDE`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Organization Member accounts Selection type. \n\n**ALL**: Include the resource and all its children \n\n**INCLUDE**: Include the specified resource\n\n**EXCLUDE**: Exclude the specified resource","enum":["ALL","INCLUDE","EXCLUDE"]}}></SchemaItem></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"{\n  \"resourceId\": \"root\",\n  \"displayName\": \"Root\",\n  \"nodeType\": \"ORG\",\n  \"selectionType\": \"ALL\"\n}"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"400"} value={"400"}><div>

bad_request / unauthorized_access

</div><div></div></TabItem><TabItem label={"404"} value={"404"}><div>

invalid_account_id_format

</div><div></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
